mapper.select: SELECT a2.USER_NICKNAME AS writer, DATE_FORMAT(a1.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, a1.BOARD_TITLE, a1.BOARD_CONTENT, a1.READCOUNT, a1.USER_NO FROM KOCO_BOARD a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT a1.BOARD_NO, a1.BOARD_TITLE, a1.BOARD_CONTENT, a2.USER_NICKNAME AS writer, DATE_FORMAT(a1.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, a1.READCOUNT FROM KOCO_BOARD a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO AND a1.BOARD_CATEGORY = 1
AND a1.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a1.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY a1.BOARD_NO DESC
